divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on the patio talking and looking at the stars. The sphere went extremely fast from East to West. It went in a straight line, not toward the horizon like a meteor. It was located in the northern sky. If I was looking at a clock, it would seem to be at about 11 o'clock. There was no report on the news. I was freaked out and ran in the house, woke up Grandma and told her what I saw. To me it looked like a ball of light
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around April 4th 2008
